interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ZUK Black Matte Lipstick 2Pcs Suede Cream Liquid Lipstick Set for Women, Vegan and Cruelty Free, 0.34 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2022/01/15
Store: ZUK
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZUK', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Liquid', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Smoothening,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Specialty': 'Cruelty,Cruelty Free,Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.87 x 0.87 inches; 2.12 Ounces'}
Review Text: This product smelled weirdly like chocolate. It was a little bit see through. I don't recommend black liquid lipstick just because when it moves around its pretty noticeable. I would stick with black lipstick. This also did not dry matte.
Review Title: Smells weird
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Loose Face Powder Long Lasting and Waterproof Oil Control Moisturizing Setting Powder Makeup 1.76 Oz
Marine Forest
{'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 1.57 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '762403411509'}
The powder itself is very matte and smooths out skin. It is also soft to run your hand across. The packaging is square which is so unnecessary and creates issues with taking the lid off. I hurt my hand every time I take the lid off because it sticks to the corners.
Powder is good, packaging is horrible

TIANG Facial Steamer, Nano Ionic Mist Face Steamer, Hydrating Mist Sprayer Water Oxygen Injection, Nano Steamer Portable Mist Humidifier, for Face Mini Spa Rejuvenation, Moisturizing Refreshing
TIANG
{'Brand': 'TIANG', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Oil, Lotion, Spray', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 1.61 x 1.61 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '757249753050'}
I LOVE this product! It is great for summer and spring or really any hot day of the year! It is super easy to fill up! You just put a little bit of water I'm a little bottle on the top of the sprayer. Then you hold the button and boom! It provides mist, and air if you leave the bottle empty! It is a amazing color and an amazing product! Perfect gift and perfect product! I really recommend this!
Super easy to fill up and super refreshing!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to prioritize personal care products that foster skin health and comfort, emphasizing gentle exfoliation and soothing solutions. They prefer subdued lip tones that cater to their sensitivity, with a recent experience reinforcing their inclination towards traditional, solid lip colors over liquid options, particularly due to issues with scents and transparency in formulations. 

Recently, they purchased a liquid lipstick but noted that it had an off-putting scent and inadequate opacity, leading to a reaffirmation of their preference for recognizable, reliable lip products. Their enthusiasm for enhancing their skincare routine persists, especially with user-friendly tools like facial steamers during warmer months.

Their interest in versatile makeup promoting a natural look remains steady, alongside a focus on intuitive packaging. In the realm of hair accessories, they explored vibrant hair tinsel strands, though usability challenges led to disappointment. They are also venturing into nail art, recently acquiring a decoration set, showcasing an appreciation for creative self-expression while maintaining comfort.

Additionally, the user values gifting options, particularly for younger demographics, emphasizing the social dimension of self-care. Overall, they are committed to discovering soothing, effective products that enhance their daily self-care routines, continually prioritizing usability and comfort.
